Speaker Request Form

  • Use this form to request a speaker for your zoo, school, civic organization or event.

    Please keep in mind that some of CCF's speakers are located in Namibia and have limited availability in the US and abroad. Speaking appearances will most likely be limited to dates which individuals are already traveling. If staff speakers are not available CCF has many qualified volunteer speakers available and we would gladly check availability for a volunteer speaker to come to you. To review CCF's staff bios please click here.
  • Staff members marked ** have regular availability in the U.S. for at least half the calendar year.
  • Please provide your second choice for a speaker request date.
    Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY
  • Please provide your second choice for a speaker request date (in case of limited availability)
    Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY
  • Please provide the city, state/province and country where you are planning your event.
  • Please enter a number from 10 to 1000.

  • Notice of Speaker Fees and Arrangements

    Minimum income requirement can be met through donations, honorariums, sponsorship, ticket sales or merchandise sales.
    Prior to the speaking engagement being confirmed, the following will be discussed and agreed upon:
    • Travel arrangements and accommodations
    • Audio Visual equipment needs and set up
    • Logistics of ticket sales and targeted guests
    • Volunteer and/or staff support needed during the event
    • Schedule of event
    • Marketing and Communications
    CCF requires that name and contact information of attendees will be shared with CCF. Attendees will receive an initial communication from CCF giving them the opportunity to opt out of all future communications.
    All attendees will receive a CCF brochure and/or remittance envelope with the invitation to make a donation to CCF's annual campaign.

Cheetah Conservation Fund

Our Research and Education Centre is located in Otjiwarongo, Namibia. We encourage visitors to see our facilities in person.

Come Join Us!

Where We Work

CCF is an international non-profit organization with fundraising operations located in: Australia, Canada, Italy, United Kingdom, and United States, working in cooperation with staff and partners around the world.

CCF Global

Support CCF

You can help save the cheetah from extinction. Support our science-based, results-driven conservation initiatives. Together, we can save the cheetah.

  • Donate
  • Sponsor a Cheetah

 

Photography on our website is provided by generous supporters like: Suzi Eszterhas, John and Angela Scott, Jennifer Leigh Warner, Craig Taylor, Vicky Morey, Andrew Harrington, Bobby Bradley and many others.
